x.description: The X coordinate of the mouse pointer in local (DOM content) coordinates

y.description: The Y coordinate of the mouse pointer in local (DOM content) coordinates

screenX.description: The X coordinate of the mouse pointer in global (screen) coordinates

screenY.description: The Y coordinate of the mouse pointer in global (screen) coordinates

altKey.description: Returns true if the alt key was down when the mouse event was fired

ctrlKey.description: Returns true if the control key was down when the mouse event was fired

shiftKey.description: Returns true if the shift key was down when the mouse event was fired
